fullText: Jackson brings his trademark intensity to the role of Doaker, the family patriarch who serves as the play's moral center, while Danielle Brooks delivers a powerhouse performance as Berniece.
dtliExcerpt: Jackson brings his trademark intensity to the role of Doaker, the family patriarch who serves as the play's moral center, while Danielle Brooks delivers a powerhouse performance as Berniece.
